publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7960 Alasdair Allan: Future of Isle of Scalpay—That the Parliament welcomes the opportunity provided for the people of Scalpay in the Western Isles, following the decision by its owner, Mr Fred Taylor, to offer ownership for free to the community; believes that the island’s social and economic future will most effectively be stewarded by decisions made by the people who live on it, and expresses support for the people of Scalpay as they consider their next steps. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, John Wilson*, Mary Scanlon*, Dave Thompson*, Brian Adam*, Kenneth Gibson*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-7960 Future of Isle of Scalpay (lodged on 17 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
